title: Tech News: Proposed Laws to Protect Consumers
itunes:title: Tech News: Proposed Laws to Protect Consumers
description:
Here in the US, the government is looking at laws that could change how tech companies operate. Japan is looking into supersonic passenger flight technology. And Amazon is cracking down on fake reviews.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
